name: Yuliya Birman
body:
![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12589472/9400276/4dd37a38-4785-11e5-8c1a-ef05af785b9f.jpg)

I am a graduate student in the Integrative Program in Quantitative Biology (iPQB) at the University of California, San Francisco (UCSF). Before moving to California, I attended The University of Alabama â€“ Tuscaloosa. There, I received a B.S. in Chemistry and worked with Dr. Patrick Frantom to conduct mechanistic studies on enzyme function and regulation. My current research interests are in the areas of membrane biophysics and structural biology.
